item.description:
Social Media Marketing for Face-to-Face Professionals

with Linda Marks, MSM

 

Our work is rooted in the sacredness of a safe, healing, face-to-face relationship.  Many of the approaches we use include touch.  How does one integrate the person-to-person nature of healing work with a world that is increasingly relying of virtual tools for communication, outreach and visibility?

Explore this question with your colleagues, with some insights shared through Linda's research and efforts to wrestle with this question after 26 years in practice.  How do we decide to use Facebook, Twitter and LinkedIn?  What about e-mail marketing?  What is best done on-line and what is best done in more "old-fashioned ways?"

Together, we can support each other in finding the balance of face-to-face and virtual realities.

Linda Marks, MSM, has practiced EKP, a heart-centered approach to body psychotherapy for 26 years, working with individuals, couples, families and groups.  She also provides coaching and meditation.
item.how_to_find_us: You will be welcomed at the door!
item.why: We live in a world that is becoming increasingly virtual, and where the top sources people use to find resources are on-line. How do we balance the sacredness of our healing work with the necessity of using internet-based tools?
